module.name: Google Voice/Chan Motif
module.description: Manage Google Voice Trunks with Chan Motif
module.changelog: *2.11.4* Fixes #6328 outbound routes *2.11.1* Remove beta status. Fixes #6326, #6318 *2.11.0beta2* Redefined routes. Added route to google voicemail option. Fixes #6065, #6066, #6067 *2.11.0beta1* Fixed Multiple Inbound Accounts DID Issue
